com.zcking.furyengine.engine.graph

Class Transformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.graph.Transformation

  • public class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper/container for matrix transformations (e.g. model-view matrix, projection matrix, etc.). Useful for passing matrix data to the shaders.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transformation()
      Constructs a new, blank transformation collection.

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectionMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()

      • updateProjectionMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f updateProjectionMatrix(float fov,
                                                float width,
                                                float height,
                                                float zNear,
                                                float zFar)
        Set the projection matrix, according to the given aspect ratio and near/far planes.
        Parameters:
        fov - The Field-of-View for the frustum.
        width - The width of the frustum.
        height - The height of the frustum.
        zNear - The near plane distance.
        zFar - The far plane distance.
        Returns:
        The computed projection matrix.

      • getOrthoProjectionMatrix

        public final org.joml.Matrix4f getOrthoProjectionMatrix()

      • updateOrthoProjectionMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f updateOrthoProjectionMatrix(float left,
                                                     float right,
                                                     float bottom,
                                                     float top,
                                                     float zNear,
                                                     float zFar)
        Sets the orthographic projection matrix, according to the orthographic parameters.
        Parameters:
        left - The left boundary.
        right - The right boundary.
        bottom - The bottom boundary.
        top - The top boundary.
        zNear - The near plane distance.
        zFar - The far plane distance.
        Returns:
        The computed orthographic projection matrix.

      • getViewMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f getViewMatrix()

      • updateViewMatrix

        public org.joml.Matrix4f updateViewMatrix(Camera camera)
        Sets the view matrix based on the current state of the Camera instance given.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera instance to base the "view" on.
        Returns:
        The computed view matrix.
